mapper.update: update seckill set number =number-1 /* 库存数量减一*/ where seckill_id=#{seckillId} and start_time <= #{killTime} /*进行秒杀时间判断*/ and end_time>=#{killTime} and number >0
mapper.select: select seckill_id,name,number,start_time,end_time,create_time from seckill order by create_time desc limit #{offset},#{limit} /* 查询指定数量的秒杀商品*/
